title: Doing Good to All
summary: Summary for Galatians 6. This chapter challenges legalism and emphasizes salvation by grace through faith in Jesus Christ.

faq.question: What is a key message in Galatians 6?
faq.answer: Salvation comes by faith in Christ, not by works of the law.

faq.question: What does Galatians 6 reveal about Christian freedom?
faq.answer: It calls believers to live by the Spirit and not return to bondage under the law.
